verses.name: Luke 14:9
verses.text: And he that bade thee and him come and say to thee, Give this man place; and thou begin with shame to take the lowest room.

verses.name: Luke 14:10
verses.text: But when thou art bidden, go and sit down in the lowest room; that when he that bade thee cometh, he may say unto thee, Friend, go up higher: then shalt thou have worship in the presence of them that sit at meat with thee.

verses.name: Luke 14:11
verses.text: For whosoever exalteth himself shall be abased; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted.
